name: @nativescript/zip
description: A simple utility class for zipping and unzipping files in NativeScript

scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src
scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-zip && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: cd ../demo && npx rimraf hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json && cd ../src && npx rimraf node_modules package-lock.json
